metadata.title: CVE-2023-40781 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Libming Libming v.0.4.8 allows a remoteattacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted .swf file to themakeswf function.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
